<MethodEndpoint

Sets the visibility settings of the promotional banners in the portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</RequestSchema>
